price: 35. Oofiya miisaanka markaad wax miisaameysaan, oo ku miisaama miisaan xaq ah. Kan baa khayr roon oo cidhib san.
arabic: وَأَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ إِذَا كِلۡتُمۡ وَزِنُواْ بِٱلۡقِسۡطَاسِ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمِۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ وَأَحۡسَنُ تَأۡوِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-awfū al-kayla idhā kil'tum wazinū bil-qis'ṭāsi al-mus'taqīmi dhālika khayrun wa-aḥsanu tawīlan
